SEARCH

Package cookbook.controller

package cookbook.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cookbook
     
    cookbook.model
     
    cookbook.viewer
     
  • Class
    Description
    BaseDaoImpl
    BaseDaoImpl is an abstract class that provides basic database operations such as establishing a connection to a database and cleaning up resources.
    BaseSearchBy
    BaseSearchBy is an abstract class that provides the base implementation for searching recipes from a database.
    CommentDao
    CommentDao is an interface that defines the CRUD operations for managing comments associated with recipes.
    CommentDaoImpl
    CommentDaoImpl is a concrete implementation of the CommentDao interface.
    DbConnection
    Our DbConnection class.
    EnumSearch
    EnumSearch is an enumeration that defines the types of searches available in the cookbook application.
    IngredientDao
    IngredientDao is an interface that defines the CRUD operations for managing ingredients and units in the cookbook application.
    IngredientDaoImpl
    IngredientDaoImpl is a concrete implementation of the IngredientDao interface.
    MessageFeedback
    MessageFeedback is an enumeration that defines the types of feedback messages that can be displayed to the user in the cookbook application.
    MessageFeedback.Error
    Enumerates the types of error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Comment
    Enumerates the types of error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Ingredient
    Enumerates the types of validation error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Recipe
    Enumerates the types of validation error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Sql
    Enumerates the types of SQL error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Step
    Enumerates the types of validation error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Tag
    Enumerates the types of validation error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Error.Unit
    Enumerates the types of Unit error messages.
    MessageFeedback.Error.User
    Enumerates the types of validation error messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Info
    Enumerates the types of information messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Info.Ingredient
    Enumerates the types of information messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success.Ingredient
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success.Recipe
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success.Step
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success.Tag
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    MessageFeedback.Success.User
    Enumerates the types of success messages that can be displayed to the user.
    RecipeDao
    RecipeDao is an interface that defines the CRUD operations for managing recipes and their related entities in the cookbook application.
    RecipeDaoImpl
    The RecipeDaoImpl class implements the RecipeDao interface.
    SearchBy
    The SearchBy interface provides methods to search for recipes based on a search string and user ID, and to get the type of search being implemented.
    SearchByIngredient
    The SearchByIngredient class extends BaseSearchBy and implements a search functionality based on ingredients.
    SearchByName
    The SearchByName class extends BaseSearchBy and implements a search functionality based on recipe names.
    SearchByTag
    The SearchByTag class extends BaseSearchBy and implements a search functionality based on recipe tags.
    StepDao
    The StepDao interface defines the methods required for creating and updating steps in a recipe.
    StepDaoImpl
    The StepDaoImpl class implements the StepDao interface.
    TagDao
    The TagDao interface provides methods for creating, deleting, and updating tags in the system.
    TagDaoImpl
    The TagDaoImpl class implements the TagDao interface.
    UserDao
    The UserDao interface provides methods for user authentication, and for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving users.
    UserDaoImpl
    The UserDaoImpl class implements the UserDao interface.
